sections.heading: Failure to file account; penaltyAn interested person may proceed by contradictory motion to remove a succession representative who has failed to file an account after being ordered to do so by the court and may obtain the remedies provided by Article 2502
sections.text: Failure to file account; penaltyAn interested person may proceed by contradictory motion to remove a succession representative who has failed to file an account after being ordered to do so by the court and may obtain the remedies provided by Article 2502.
